item.title: 16 Jan 2021 23:47
item.description:
Lifting the veil: Just about a decade ago, we leased a property on a pristine and desolate beach. The house didn’t have robust walls – It just had a few curtains to protect us from the elements. The rooms internally had walls full of transparent glass… https://t.co/aWNZU9PCdv

Link to Tweet
